GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.20
GSD.description:
net/mlx5e: Fix handling of wrong devices during bond netevent

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.20 by commit fe70126da6063c29ca161cdec7ad1dae9af836b3, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7e51891a237f9ea319f53f9beb83afb0077d88e6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/mlx5e: Fix handling of wrong devices during bond netevent
